General.Name: MediBond
General.Description: Medibond is a blockchain-based platform designed to improve the pharmaceutical, insurance, and healthcare sectors. Medibond seeks to improve interaction between the biggest healthcare industrial players to help provide services more efficiently and securely to end users.

ICO.Description:
Medibond is a blockchain-based platform designed to improve the pharmaceutical, insurance, and healthcare sectors. Medibond seeks to improve interaction between the biggest healthcare industrial players to help provide services more efficiently and securely to end users.

Team:

  • Ben Steffens: Founder & President
  • James Billot: Cofounder & Advisor 
  • Albrito Marques: Marketing & Strategy 
  • Divya Gawas: Lead Developer 

Medibond is holding its ICO on the 5th of August, 2017. It will last for a month or until the maximum cap of $15M is reached. During the ICO, 80% tokens will be available for BTC, LTC and ETH. The remaining tokens will be destributed in the following way:

Token Reserve Split (XX%):

  • 4%Affiliate;
  • 5% MediBond Development Team;
  • 1% Bounties/Rewards;
  • 6% Early Bonus;
  • 4% > 50 BTC Investor Bonus

The MEDI ICO will feature bonuses and bounties as well.

Bonus Structure:

  • 15% Bonus: Aug. 8th 00:00 UTC - Aug. 18th 23:59 UTC
